name: Ownee171's Stream VN Collection
description: Hi there! I'm Ownee171. Occasionally, I stream on twitch.tv. Sometimes when I do this I make a micro visual novel using the words from a Codenames board, Ren'py for the writing, and Aseprite to make the images. This is a collection of the first five of these micro-visual novels that I made this way. They're weird, random, and sometimes nonsensical, and the art style is...interesting to say the least. But hey, I hope there's some enjoyment to be had in them. And it's free, so at worst you wasted a whole $0.
